憐恤.definition: to take pity; to show compassion

憐惜.definition: to take pity on; to feel tenderness toward

憐愛.definition: to have tender affection for; to love tenderly; to pamper sb

憐憫.definition: to take pity on; pity; mercy

憐香惜玉.definition: to have tender, protective feelings for the fairer sex (idiom)
